extendedInfo.description: Using True Image(TM) by Acronis(R) on your PC?- Get Access to your Acronis Cloud;- Sync Gallery across devices;- Add files to Favorites to keep them up-to-date and get offline access;- Share files with your friends through public links;- Upload photos, videos, etc  from the SD card to Acronis Cloud;Support: http://www.acronis.com/support/contact-us.html

reviews.title: Good app, performance sucks
reviews.comment: It works good and has nice features. 2 things are not good:  - Sometimes accessing your files and folders will take a lot of time even when your on really fast WiFi. - An error will come up while a folder is in use from another machine at the same time.
reviews.author: Michael S.

reviews.title: no internet connection?
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t work. It constantly claims not to have any internet access whether you\'re on 2G, 3G, 4G or Wi-Fi. Disappointing.
reviews.author: adrian Armstrong

reviews.title: A few false starts...
reviews.comment: After a few false starts I now have this working. I use True Image 2013 on my PC including a subscription for online backup. Using this app I can access all of the files I have backed up on my phone so I am happy with it. Not sure why it didn\'t work first time but it may have been that an incremental online backup was running on the PC.
reviews.author: Jon Stokes

reviews.title: Problem with .CO.UK Logons
reviews.comment: Why is True Image on the PC so good and the android one so bad. It states my .co.uk email address is invalid. Judging by the past feedback this has been an ongoing problem for a while. Please correct.
reviews.author: John Brimlow

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.comment: Not only does it say I have no subscription even though I do, the support email address they give on the App page is an unattended address. I didn\'t think Google allowed that. They certainly shouldn\'t! Bottom line, POS.
reviews.author: Terry Bush

reviews.title: Disappointing
reviews.comment: I\'m a long time customer of Acronis products. As soon as I log in \"Your subscription has expired\". I recall a trial long ago on my PC, so apparently I can\'t even try the Android app. LOL What a joke. Too many free options such as Clickfree with Box, Dropbox, 4Sync, and other cloud storage providers. Acronis is not competitive here.
reviews.author: Keith Wineka

reviews.title: Worthless App
reviews.comment: Can\'t login because it reports the I don\'t have an internet connection even though I just downloaded it!
reviews.author: Rick McMullen

reviews.title: Not compatible not free
reviews.comment: Ok ish idea but not free as you need to subscribe to Acronis Cloud.  Dropbox much much better solution and is free.
reviews.author: Steven Messenger

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: At least I can log on to the account and see the files that were backed up from my PCs. No way I can make photosync work, or upload any files from my phone. This could have been nice supplements to my Acronis Trueimage Home account, but there is long way to go.... Will uninstall along with Acronis Cloud...
reviews.author: Tom Leveraas

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: App would not connect with an error message stating no Internet connection.
reviews.author: Andy C

reviews.title: Nice app
reviews.comment: Working on defy very good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool tool.
reviews.comment: Very useful.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Need more options
reviews.comment: This could be great if we had the option to sync other folders.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hopeless
reviews.comment: Fails to login now, but when it did work it was very limited in sync options
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closing on my Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I\'d have given it 0 stars if that was possible, simply because I notified Acronis weeks ago that it was crashing on my Nexus and they never responded.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Horribly slow
reviews.comment: This application takes forever to sync your date up with your computer or the cloud. You\'re better off just simply removing your sd card plugging it into your computer and copy the data.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Poor, limited, defective
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Flawless so far
reviews.comment: Two PCs already set up to sync with each other. Now also syncing to my SGS2 using this app. So far so good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Currently force closing on LG G2X
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Just like google dropbox
reviews.comment: Was hoping for more than just sync. Was hoping that it\'d fully backup my device.  Now just plugging phone into my pc and backing yo that way.
reviews.author: A Google User
